Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2014 11:19PM kickin-cancersbutt-2014 wrote: I had the exact same thing during the last two wks of rads. I asked the doc to prescribe "Magic Mouthwash" it worked within 3 days, I could swallow and breathe without pain. It wasn't covered by my insurance so had to fork out $23 or so, but well worth it! Hope this helps anyone else expereiencing the pain.
Posts.Title: Difficulty swallowing, a radiation side efffect? nanabolini yoga_girl
